baltimoredata 0.1.0
  • Reference

    BNIA Vital Signs Indicators, 2010-2018

    vital_signs_indicators.Rd

    Labels, definitions, and data sources for the Vital Signs indicators used by the Baltimore Neighborhood Indicators Alliance from 2010 to 2018.

    vital_signs_indicators

    Format

    A data frame with 177 rows and 7 variables:

    label

    Indicator label

    section

    Vital Signs report section

    source

    Indicator data source

    normalization_source

    Normalization data source, e.g. Census data for CSA residents

    definition

    Indicator definition

    indicator

    Indicator variable name

    years_available

    Years available

    Source

    https://bniajfi.org/vital_signs/

    Contents

    Developed by Eli Pousson.

    Site built with pkgdown 2.0.2.

    Using preferably template.
